name: 4chan - 4chan X CSS defaults
description:
For vanilla 4chan (Yotsuba / Yotsuba B / Futaba / Burichan) + 4chan X (2.9.0+) users.

Adjusts style of inline replies and hover preview to be clearer. 

E-mail and filename expansion options plucked from a github issue (https://github.com/aeosynth/4chan-x/issues/144).
Outline fading from github comment (https://github.com/aeosynth/4chan-x/issues/271#issuecomment-2044308).
additional_info:
changelog:
v22
-friendlier inline bgc for dark themes
-remove old browser specific tags

v21
-long overdue fixes to quote previews and hr removals

v18 / v19 / v20
-Update for 4chan's new HTML/CSS. Let me know if there's stuff that isn't working.
-Show email: bolded to match the old style
-Removed some old stuff.

v17
-Increase specificity of #qp
-Default sticky navigation to "neither" until I make it less ugly

v16
-QP: Add /b/ackwash reloaded hover styling

v15
-Make QP (quote preview) styling an option

v14
-Add some missing selectors (just in case)
-uɯɐp pob sʇoɥsuǝǝɹɔs ɹɐoɯ 

v13
-Outline styling
	See bug comment: https://github.com/aeosynth/4chan-x/issues/271#issuecomment-2044308
	Options: Default* (default 4chan X behavior), Fade (pulled from Mayhem's comment), Flash (canv.as-like, uses animations - not compatible with Opera for now)

v12
-See 4chan X commit: https://github.com/aeosynth/4chan-x/commit/e8a48a814791b1df06850f6edd93dbf170dffb2c
-Make backlink counter default

v11
-Backlink counter*

v10
-Hide bottom-most trademark/copyright notice*

v9
-Experimental: Reveal spoiler thumbnail on hover -- you must have "Reveal Spoilers" enabled in 4chan X.

v8
-Text spoiler options

v7
-Fix forwardlink markers colliding into text.
-Add sticky menu options ("Top only" enabled by default)
-Sticky menu -> Sticky navigation to maintain consistency between style 46162

v6
-4chanX 2.13.0 makes the inline expansion fix unnecessary

v5
-temporarily add inline expansion fix (see: https://github.com/aeosynth/4chan-x/pull/163)

v4
-expand filenames*

v3
-show forward link marker*

v2
-hide logo*
-hide ads*
-hide post area in threads
-show email

* enabled by default

discussions.name: Option for the old hover style?

style_setting_options.label: CSS defaults (padded, light outline)
style_setting_options.value: body > #qp { background-color: inherit !important; border: 1px solid rgb(128, 128, 128) !important; padding: 4px !important; }

style_setting_options.label: /b/ackwash reloaded
style_setting_options.value: body > #qp { background-color: inherit !important; border: 1px solid #aaa !important; padding: 6px !important; }

style_settings.label: Reveal spoiler thumbnail on hover (see changelog v9)

style_setting_options.label: Yes
style_setting_options.value: img[alt*="Spoiler"]:not(:hover) { width: 0px !important; height: 100px !important; padding-left: 100px !important; background: transparent url("http://static.4chan.org/image/spoiler.png") !important; }
